result.name: connectivity-matrices-for-seven-benthic-species
result.notes:
These are connectivity matrices calculated from the results of Lagrangian 
models (GITM forced with GETM) for the period 2001-2010 and for seven benthic 
species:

Alcyonium digitatum, Echinus esculentus, Lophelia pertusa, Metridium senile 
var. dianthus, Porifera, Mythilus edulis and Crepidula fornicata.

The paper describing the calculation of these matrices and the analysis can be 
found in:

`https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-018-32912-2`_




.. _`https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-018-32912-2`:
    https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-018-32912-2
